item.title: I want one this for Christmas this year..
item.dc:creator: mechaelite
item.description:
Well, here in Spain is Christmas celebration time until January 6 and then I still have a Friday, Saturday and Sunday free. So for me, it can come out for christmas yet.

(The bad thing of having until day 6 is taht we do not celebrate halloween, st. Patrick’s day or thanksgiving day )

item.title: I want one this for Christmas this year..
item.dc:creator: shadowscrawl
item.description:
mechaelite:

Now I’ve been thinking about Black Mesa’s release… what if it comes out? What will be of this forum 3 months after it’s release? will it die? will all of us forget about it?

Oh Jesus if only I had a quarter for every time this question has been asked around here.

item.title: I want one this for Christmas this year..
item.dc:creator: sup_amp_955_tails3
item.description:
BrAndi:

Jerry CHANGE YOUR goddamn sig ! I just wasted 5 minutes of my life chasing the mouse cursor with my own mouse cursor.

Btw. I am betting my e-shop and server this will not come out before christmas.

XD I just spent forever doing the exact same thing
I think the devs spent all of their time making the nice christmas themed front page rather than finalizing the mod.

item.title: I want one this for Christmas this year..
item.dc:creator: higgsboson
item.description:
mechaelite:

Now I’ve been thinking about Black Mesa’s release… what if it comes out? What will be of this forum 3 months after it’s release? will it die? will all of us forget about it?

I can already imagine new threads like:

  • “your favorite part in Black Mesa”
  • “bugs and glitches”
  • “wen will Balk Meas be relaesed??//”
  • “please release a patch”
  • “screenshots thread 2”
  • “combine: where r they?/11”
  • “what the devs should have done differently”
  • “running Black Mesa on a Nokia 5310 tutorial”

Read full topic
